guaranties.title: Guarantees
guaranties.description: When making macarons and other desserts, we use only natural ingredients and colorings, preparing our products according to the original recipes of the world's best confectioners. We bake orders on the day of shipment, so you can always be sure of their freshness. We do not use preservatives, leavening agents, or flavor enhancers.

del.title: Delivery and Payment
intervalsItems: in Moscow delivery the day after the order is placed
del.note: The courier will notify you 30-40 minutes before arrival.

wholesal.optomSubtitle: Special offer! Special delivery conditions across Kyrgyzstan.
wholesal.optomDescription: Since 2013, we produce and supply desserts in bulk for coffee shops and cafes. Our desserts are sold in major confectionery chains in St. Petersburg. They are bright, natural, allow high markup, and customers keep coming back.

contact.title: Contacts
contact.description: Contact us in the way that is convenient for you:

abouts.title: About Us
abouts.text: MacaronShop was founded in 2013. We are the first manufacturer of macarons in Bishkek. Initially, we focused on one product ‚Äî French macarons. Later, we began producing wafer rolls, nut cookies, profiteroles, and eclairs. Today, we supply our products to major coffee and pastry chains in Bishkek, as well as cafes and restaurants. You can order all types of pastries wholesale or request a retail price list.
